titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income qualified attorney fees.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income qualified attorney fees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income attorney fees and court costs paid by an individual taxpayer in connection with a civil lawsuit.
